_header: Saint Edward the good king right is to have in mind
Subjects: saints’ lives; Edward the Confessor, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Edward the Confessor in the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
seint edward þe gode king ryȝt is to haue in mendebore he
                    was in ingelond I wole telle of what kende…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…god for þe loue of seint edward vs bringe to þe
                    blis& to þe hy ioyȝe of heuene þat his soule in
                    is

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn edward þe gode kyng riȝt is to habbe in mundeIbore
                    he was in engelond Ichulle segge of wuch kunde…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…So þat non ne deude þer of after him
                    desturbingeþe chirch he let halwy as [ ]childermasse dai
BodAsh43.Note: Incomplete: the last folios survive only as fragments.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint edward þe gode king riȝt is to haue in mendeIbore he was in englond ichol sigge of whiche kende…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe loue of seint edward ous bring to þilke blis& to þe heie Ioie of heuen as his soule Inne is
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum Ci” added to right margin by later hand (f. 281); ends “Amen” (f. 197v).
